case_title: KISHANLAL HARICHARAN vs INCOME-TAX OFFICER, A-WARD, NIZAMABAD

key_points.issue_1: Notice under section 35(5) of the Income-tax Act, 1922 issued after the Income-tax Act, 1961 came into force.
key_points.issue_2: Rectification order under section 35(5) barred by limitation.

petitioner.limitation_period: Four years from the date of the final order under section 33-A.
petitioner.contention: Impugned order passed beyond the limitation period.

respondent.justification: Rectification order passed within four years from the consequential order dated January 29, 1963.

court_observations.final_order: Income-tax Officer's order dated January 29, 1963 deemed as final order.

judgment_summary.reasoning: Rectification order passed within the limitation period.
